5.text: First Encounter at the Tavern Fight

6.name: Drunkard
6.text: "I'm gonna do it, I'm gonna do it!!"

7.name: Drunkard
7.text:
"What the hell are you doing, you bastard!!
Oraaa!!"

8.name: Guest
8.text: "Ooooh! It's a fight, it's a fight!"

10.name: Sol
10.text: "Ohhh...!? F-fighting is not a good thing...!?"

11.name: Eric
11.text:
"It's fine, just leave them be. It's more like
entertainment, if anything."

13.name: Eric
13.text:
"Besides, the cost of the broken items will be
split evenly among those who fought, regardless of
the outcome. Just let them do as they please."

14.name: Sol
14.text: "Ohhh...!? I see...!! Then I'll watch too!!"

15.name: Barkeep
15.text:
"Well, you know, it's really a big nuisance for
me. But no one seems to understand that part."

16.name: Narration
16.text:
As I leisurely watched the adventurers' fight, a
corner of the room suddenly exploded. Several
drunkards were blown away. Then, from the smoke, a
dark-skinned elf looking extremely indignant and a
calm white elf appeared.

17.name: Wayne
17.text:
"Jeez... Do you even know who you're picking a
fight with!? I'll leave a dent in that face about
10cm deep, you know!?"

18.name: Seres
18.text:
"Wayne, that's enough. It's already over, isn't
it?"

19.name: Wayne
19.text:
"I won't be satisfied until I show them a little
more pain! Look! My ale is almost spilled..."

21.name: Wayne
21.text: "I get it, I get it... So stop glaring at me..."

24.name: Villager
24.text:
"Oh, Sol-chan. You've come at just the right
time."

26.name: Villager
26.text:
"The other day, that guy Uji found a hot spring at
the foot of the village. So, we tried making an
open-air bath. Would you like to come in, Sol-
chan?"

27.name: Sol
27.text:
"Ooooooh...!! A hot spring...!! It's a warm
spring, isn't it...!! With the smell of
sulfur...!!"

28.name: Sol
28.text: "I'll give it a try!! I'll call everyone too!!"

30.name: Sol
30.text:
"Ooooooh...!! It was an irresistible hot
spring..."

31.name: Isk
31.text:
"For me... it's a bit hot, but... just the human
culture... like this... ah... I'm getting a little
excited..."

32.name: Eric
32.text: "Sol-chan, stop teasing that dragon a bit."

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.text:
"Hmm... As expected, baths are wonderful. I feel
like my travel fatigue is also healing."

35.name: Eric
35.text:
"That's right. I've been quite busy lately. It's
nice to be able to relax like this."

36.name: Eni-sensei
36.text:
"We never know when the next threat will strike.
It's important to build up our morale like this
whenever we can."

41.name: Eni-sensei
41.text:
"Perhaps it's just a natural habit for them.
Definitely. Probably. I'll make a point not to
worry about it. I have."

44.text: The old man at the magic shop

45.name: Sol
45.text: "Excuse me!! Ohhh... This is the magic shop...!!"

46.name: Grandpa Wizard
46.text:
"Oh, it's rare for a dragon to come to this tower.
Quite an interesting guest, I must say."

47.name: Sol
47.text:
"Nice to meet you, grandpa! ...Do you live in a
place like this?"

48.name: Grandpa Wizard
48.text:
"Yes, indeed. I may look like this, but I am the
great magician Prestrois. If you need magical
items, feel free to ask."

49.name: Sol
49.text:
"Wow, you're the wizard grandpa!! There are so
many magical items...! Amazing! Oh, this one is
amazing! It's beautiful, isn't it?!"

50.name: Grandpa Wizard
50.text: "Hmmm... (More like a puppy than a dragon...)"

51.name: Grandpa Wizard
51.text:
"Well, if you feel like it, come and visit again.
I'll give you something in exchange for the
treasures you've collected."

52.name: Sol
52.text: "Yaaay! Can I take a look around?"
